TopicTitle: Project Arctic Film- Be Part Of Something Great

Articles.Content:
Well I was thinking it should have enough room for a rover, which I need to get round to designing, is it possible we could mix two ideas together? I have been speaking to some people and they gave me an idea for a dropship, they said that they liked the way that the dropship out of aliens delivered its cargo. Here is pic

http://www.ianlawrencemodels.com/web%20pics/dropship/Pic_0073.jpg

I dont like the art style, but I do like the way that the rover is hidden inside, so the shuttle will have to be quite big, a welded frame should be ok with doors and detailing added later would be perfect to reduce part count.

As for mods, currently I think we definitely need: B9, firespitter, texture replacer, planet factory, Welder, stuff like that, i'll go through the add on section at the weekend to post a list of what is available. As for mod count, for a movie this size I think that we should use mods as some parts in the game aren't up to standard. I think the best way is to use a shared game save that way we can know what mods are being used

Welp, i actually tried it out... no idea how to tie the kerbal to the sled. mabye one of those mods that allows a tow rope?

http://i.imgur.com/ehrQ89R.jpg

That's looks epic really well done I love it so much

Quick little jot on what I post here. I'm just giving suggestions so you can disregard anything I post if it doesn't make sense. I'm just giving examples and concept art and seeing if you like it.

On that note... If the planet the team is investigating has an atmosphere and requires a super durable rover, I find this general shape of rover to be super cool:

Obviously it'd need major modifications, but the body shape is pretty cool imo. More pictures and "building instructions" here: http://fichtenfoo.net/blog/in-progress-%C2%BB-armored-dune-hopper/

And again I'm just throwing out concept art for you all. For ideas. Vagani, the rover is in your hands

so, pc is coming back tomorrow, which means I can start building stuff, and make a video on my cars, yay isn't this fun XD, I am getting really excited about this film, we just need to iron out a few issues and then we can begin briefing

Ok so I have compiled a list of mods that we could use:

-[0.25] Alcubierre Warp Drive (Stand-alone)

Could be very useful for making the propulsion of the mothership, it is what i was hoping would be used.

-[0.25] TextureReplacer 1.9.2

Useful for making suits, and planets and other things, this is a must

-[0.25] B9 Aerospace | Release 5.2.6

Excellent for making the futuristic dropships and rovers, and most importantly the structures, I think this has to be another must

-[0.25] TweakScale - Rescale Everything!

This can be used to reduce part count and add detail whilst also making ships more practical

-[0.25] Kerbal Attachment System (KAS) 0.4.9

Very useful for the sledge and other things, grappling hooks and stuff

-[0.25+] HyperEdit - Teleporter, Orbit & Planet Editor, & More.

Some of these ships will most likely only be props and we need to get them places, the mothership has to be big enough however you don't have to worry about stuff like delta-v

-[0.25] EVA Follower [v1.03, 05 Nov 2014]

Useful for large scenes and crews, a must in my books

-Firespitter propeller plane and helicopter parts v6.3.5 (Sep 1st) for KSP 0.24.2

Need this for the sledge and stuff, very useful and can be used for the arctic plane

-[0.25] Camera Tools (Stationary Camera) v1.1

Useful for creating the shots that we need

-[0.25] PlanetShine v0.2.2

Again, useful for making the films eye candy

-[0.25] Near Future Technologies (17/11/14: All packs, CTT compatibility)

Everything about this mod is cool, this like B9 is a must for the film

-[0.25] Rover Wheel Sounds

Well, why wouldn't we want sounds as they are at the moment silent :/

-UbioZur Welding Unofficial update for KSP 0.24.2 & 0.25 v.04

Finally, another must, we need it for structures and ships, to make them easy to move about. The final scene will need a duplicate, non-welded ship to crash to make it look aesthetically pleasing

Blue: Builders mods

Red: Recorders mods (Obviously the recorders will need the same mods as ther builders but then again that is why I said " However you will need a PC capable of loading and testing crafts with high parts if needed"

Tell me your thoughts on them, environment mods are also needed, we could wait for astronomer to release the interstellar pack, that looks amazing at the moment.

I have shorten the mod list to make it more stock, the mods remaining are either eye candy or help make important parts of the film. You do not need them all, download whatever you want from the list and then tell the recorders what you have used, this will decrease the affect on PC performance.
